Content.Text:
<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you're the new farmer who moved here,
right? I'm Marian. Nice to meet you.
<PAGE>
As you see, I'm a doctor. ...Do you find
something striking about my appearance? Well,
you wouldn't be the first.
<PAGE>
Such is the price of beauty. Now, whenever you
feel ill, please let me know. I promise I'll treat
you kindly.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. What do you think
of my radiant beauty today?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. What brings you up and about
so early in the morning?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, hello. How is the day treating you?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. I hope your work's
all finished by now.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. What brings you here so late in
the evening?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. You know, staying
up so late isn't good for your health. It's
especially hard on your poor, delicate skin.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, such a lovely day. The sunlight is so warm
in the spring. Take in a deep breath and feel it
wash over you.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, the weather is certainly melancholy today.
Days like this are made for staying home.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, the sun is so strong today! I should rub on
some sunscreen immediately, before this lovely
skin pays the price.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Summer rains do cool the ground we walk on,
but they're also quite annoying.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>There's such humidity after the rain! It's so
exhausting.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Few things are more beautiful than a bright,
sunny day in autumn. Especially in the forest.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's something sad about an autumn rain. It's
like it's weeping for the year gone by and
heralding the coming of winter...
<PAGE>
...But nothing cleanses the heart like a good cry,
wouldn't you say?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's a lovely day, isn't it? It's cold, but the air is
so clean. Ah, wonderful.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's snowing today, is it...? Be careful not to trip.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you! What are you thinking?! You should
stay home on a day like this.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you stay outside in this weather, you'll end up
as a snowman.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Come to think of it, <MYNAME>, I heard you
were seeing someone, yes? Ah, so there's more
to you than meets the eye.
<PAGE>
On the outside, you look so lost and innocent,
but inside, you have the heart of a hunter!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I sometimes talk with Klaus. He always has the
finest aromas all around him. It's so relaxing just
being in his presence.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My job is to keep the people of this town upbeat
and able-bodied.
<PAGE>
And I'm lucky enough to have Angela with me.
She's a wonderful nurse. Whenever you feel ill,
we'll make you better right away.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I sometimes have friends over, and we always
end up discussing the many kinds of beauty in
the world. Why don't you join us sometime?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Giorgio hasn't changed a bit. He still likes
flowers. And he grows them so beautifully! I
think it's an expression of his love.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I always pass by here on the way to Giorgio's
farm. The view is so pleasant.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I sometimes see people fishing in the river. I'm
not much of a fisherman myself, but I do
wonder what they can catch.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fritz's farm is nearby. Sadly, he's a rather homely
fellow.
<PAGE>
If he keeps dressing like that, he'll be single for
the rest of his life. Maybe you should talk to him
about it.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not built for long walks, I'm afraid, though I
have been training regularly.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sometimes I feel enough pep to climb a
mountain! Then I take one step outside, and it all
goes away.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How's your work? Are you doing well?
<PAGE>
Whenever you're tired, just come to me. I can
examine you anytime.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As a doctor, it's my job to cure disease. But that
also involves studying the heart and the body,
and finding the beauty therein.
<PAGE>
True beauty comes from inside, you see. A pure
heart makes a body healthy, and a healthy mind
makes a body beautiful.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>In short, all you need is...love. That's what all
beauty comes from, in the end.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...Do you understand? Oh, you look a bit tired.
What happened?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, how's your farm? Enjoying your
work?
<PAGE>
Well, you must be, seeing as how you came
here to farm and all. But don't work too hard.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>If you focus too deeply on what you enjoy, you
tend to neglect your health, pass out and wake
up at the clinic...!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>That said, if you do end up here, I'll be happy to
treat you, but still, try to take it easy on yourself.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I live alone, but I've never felt lonely in this town.
<PAGE>
My friends here are like family. I feel like I belong
here, and...well, it's not often I can say that.
<PAGE>
Taking care of their health, and yours, is my way
of saying thank you.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you look in a mirror every day? ...What? You
don't have a mirror?! I can't believe it.
<PAGE>
Mirrors aren't just for appearances, you know.
It's important to look at yourself every now and
again.
<PAGE>
When you're healthy, you look fantastic. And
keeping track of your health can make you more
beautiful. Mirrors are useful for that.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Long ago, I worked in a full-scale hospital.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Of course, I was just as enamored with beauty
back then, so I still dressed like this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Then one day, they threatened to fire me unless I
started dressing "normally."
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What does "normal" even mean? So I told them
if I couldn't treat my patients over some arbitrary
dress code, I'd quit.
<PAGE>
That's how I came to this town.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. We're friends, aren't we?
<PAGE>
So let's help each other keep our hearts and
bodies pure.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you got me some
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>? I love it! Thank you
so much. <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
This is a kiss of gratitude. *kiss*<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, honey, you know just what I like!
<PAGE>
I'll gladly accept it. <RED>∀</RED> Thank you!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, is this for me? I like it! Thank you. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, is this for me? How sweet of you. Thank
you. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my... Is this for me? You don't have to try to
be so nice to me. But, since it's coming from
you, I'll accept it. Thanks.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Eek, is that what I think it is?!
<PAGE>
I'm afraid I don't much care for these...but if you
insist, I'll accept it...

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Y-you're trying to give me this
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>...? Are you...harassing
me?! I hate this more than anything!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But what's done is done. I'll take it as a practical
joke.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, is that golden fruit? Why, thank you! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, look how flashy it is! I'm actually not the
biggest fan of flashiness, but thank you. <RED>∀</RED>
Let's not give him a present for now.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not quite in the mood for presents just now.
Please save it for later, and thank you.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You don't have to try to be so nice. And I can't
discount the consultation fee.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh my, you got me some
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>? I love it!
<PAGE>
Is this a birthday present? Oh, that's so sweet.
Thank you. <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
This is a kiss of gratitude. *kiss* <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh my, is this a birthday present?! I truly
appreciate the thought.
<PAGE>
You certainly know what I like, honey. Thanks so
much!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Huh? A birthday present for me? And it's
something I like, too!
<PAGE>
Thank you. You've made it a happy birthday. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, is this...a birthday present? How sweet of
you. Thank you. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my...is this for me...? What? It's a birthday
present?
<PAGE>
You don't have to try to be so nice to me. But
since it's coming from you, I'll accept it. Thanks.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Eek, is that what I think it is?! Oh, I don't much
care for those...
<PAGE>
Hm? It's a birthday present? Well, in that case, I
suppose I'll accept it...

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Aww... You want to give me this
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>...? Are you...harassing
me?! I hate this more than anything!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But since it's a birthday present from you, I'll
take it as a practical joke.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, is this a birthday present for me? How very
flashy!
<PAGE>
I'll accept it. Thank you. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a very flashy birthday present, hmm? A
little flashier than I usually care for, to be honest,
but I'll accept it. Thank you. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, a rabbit. Look at its red eyes.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Hmm, it's a cute little critter, if I look at it from
this angle.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Hmm, that critter's got a cute little face, from
this angle.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Could you keep that creature away from me,
please?!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, what a strange-looking rabbit. Such
exquisite fur.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Could you keep that creature away from me,
please?!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Whoa! Please don't bring that creature any
closer!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's a cute dog. Seems it likes you.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, now that dog is much too fat. You're its
owner, aren't you? You need to watch its
weight.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a nice dog. It looks very intelligent.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, now that dog is much too fat. You're its
owner, aren't you? You need to watch its
weight.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what a cute kitty! I love cats!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...This kitty's adorable, but it is overweight. You
should be careful about that.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what a cute cat! Such nice fur.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...This kitty's adorable, but it is overweight. You
should be careful about that.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, such a beautiful flower. A present for the
Flower Fair, is it? How sweet of you. Thank you.
<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear, you mean to give me that blue feather?
...You know what it means, yes? Well then, I
accept your proposal, honey.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>He he, I'm only joking. Don't take it seriously, all
right?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A ring...?! Oh, you want to be with me?
<PAGE>
...I know. I was only joking.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, what a beautiful present. I like the color of
the ribbon. What's inside?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, a present for me? What is it?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you know what day it is today?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>The answer is...your birthday! Here's a present
from me. Happy birthday! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's your birthday, isn't it? Sorry to say I
didn't buy you a present...but happy birthday! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's been a long time since we last talked,
hasn't it? How have you been?
<PAGE>
You can always come visit, you know, even if
you're feeling perfectly healthy.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That apron looks stylish. Indeed it does. Don't
forget to dress up even while you're working.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh my, that's a fine outfit. I think it's too clean
for workwear, but I like your taste. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your outfit for the day looks great, and you look
great in it.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, I like the clothes you're wearing. Fashionable
workwear is the best!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that a sailor's uniform you're wearing? Not
what I'd expect from a farmer. Are you going
somewhere?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that a sailor's uniform you're wearing? Not
what I'd expect from a farmer, but that pink
scarf does look good on you.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My, what a cute raincoat! The color
combination is very chic.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, what a cute outfit that is. It looks very good
on you.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've never seen that kind of clothing. But I think
you wear it well. You have good taste. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a beautiful dress. Not too gaudy. It
looks...noble, I'd say.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My, what a nice outfit! For a moment, I thought
some foreign prince had come to see me. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, you're wearing a yellow high-neck jacket
today? It goes with the color of your skirt.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you look splendid today! I really like that
orange jacket. ♪

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why are you dressed like a doctor?! ...Well, in
any case, you look good in that costume.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you look beautiful dressed up as a nun!
...But how do you do any farm work in that
costume?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you a cook today? Well, you look good in
that. <RED>∀</RED> Make me something delicious later.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...That looks funny, but I don't know what to
say...

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Why are you dressed like a
magician? Have you got any tricks up your
sleeve?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Well, first, make me ten years younger! Come on
now, hop to it. ♪

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, are you wearing a maid costume today? You
look great in that.♪ You should work at the
mansion.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you're a butler today? Well, you look good in
that costume.♪ Some rich family might come
along and hire you.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That cap looks clean. That's critical when you're
a doctor.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, what a cute hat! Well, more like an
accessory than a hat, I suppose.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, the perfect farm wear! It fits you perfectly.
You look so...cool! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, that beret is very stylish. You look like an
artist.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that hat is just my type! I bet it would look
even better on me.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My, that's a nice crown! But only a king can
wear it.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Those are nice glasses. I like the white frames.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Those are very stylish sunglasses. But I imagine
they'd look even more stylish on me. ♪

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Going for the pirate look, I see? Just a word of
caution: if you keep wearing that, your eyes will
get worse.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, what's wrong with your eye? I'm not an eye
doctor, but I can take a look if you want.
<PAGE>
...Hmm? There's nothing wrong with it at all...?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Well, you certainly had me fooled!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, what's wrong? Are you feeling ill?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm afraid it's time for my beauty sleep, so if you
wouldn't mind, I'll see you later. And make sure
you get enough sleep, yourself.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Pardon me while I finish eating this, please.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I like this street lamp. It's stylish. I think it
fits this town very well.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, this table looks nice and sturdy. But what
exactly is it doing here?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a nice-looking fountain. You have a
wonderful sense of aesthetics, don't you?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The blue light illuminates this tree so beautifully.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cherry blossoms are always gorgeous, aren't
they?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, so many white decorations here. White is
the color of cleanliness. It's my favorite. ♪

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't you think silver is a beautiful color? Just
looking at silver relaxes me somehow.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You have pretty sharp taste. Everything here is
very fashionable. I don't think I could ever get
bored of seeing it. ♪

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's very difficult to create this twinkling
atmosphere. You're...quite a talented decorator.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
These decorations make me feel more in touch
with the universe... Brilliant. That's all I have to
say.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This place is very summer-like. I like it. It teems
with life.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town's grown so noisy these days, but I
suppose that's the price of fame.
<PAGE>
I must admit, it's exciting to see so many people
come here from all over the world.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since our town's been getting all these new
visitors, my clinic's grown quite a bit busier.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Of all the places I've worked, this town is the
most easygoing.
<PAGE>
That's all well and good, but I do believe the
guild wants to make this town more famous.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We would need more stores to attract tourists,
wouldn't we?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Veronica is doing her best to make this town
grow, but what it's going to take is all of us
working together.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've heard of various stores coming to the Trade
Depot. I should go see them for myself.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here's your allowance for the day. Use it well.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a beautiful bench, all shining in blue.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Benches look clean when they're whitewashed,
don't they? I like it.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not the biggest fan of gaudy things, but I do
appreciate this silver bench.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Some white pots like these would look good in
my room.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a charming wagon. I want one for my
clinic.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, what a fancy garden chair. Perfect for taking
a nice break in the middle of a walk.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, why is this garden parasol here? Are you
planning a party?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ice lamps are so beautiful, aren't they?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The blue light illuminates this pole so beautifully.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The blue light illuminates this gate so beautifully.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's an interesting vehicle. I'd love to take it
for a ride...but how exactly does one drive it?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's something about white roses that speaks
to my heart.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, snowdrop flowers. I like those.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's something about white roses that speaks
to my heart.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, snowdrop flowers. I like those.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cherry blossoms are always gorgeous, aren't
they?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think a white flower basket fits me well.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
These blue flowers make this arch look so
pretty.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wish I had a gazebo like this in my garden,
too...

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
White fences make the town look cleaner, don't
they? It's a very nice effect.
